title: ‘I’m Ready to Defend my Vuelta Title:’ Sepp Kuss Back on Top with Big Win
content:
'Sepp finished it off fantastically:' The victory will see Kuss return to the Vuelta a España to defend his 2023 crown with renewed confidence.

Read the full article at ‘I’m Ready to Defend my Vuelta Title:’ Sepp Kuss Back on Top with Big Win on Velo.
author: ahood
